title: beginners problem
body:
can somebody help me
how to fix "Ascension: We have disabled Shaco due to in game issues, and are currently working on a resolution." ?

replies.body: Shaco was disabled during this week's rotating game mode due to an issue.  I'm not sure if it will be resolved before the end of this week's game mode, but bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page to stay up to date.  Let me know if that clears things up!
